info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 6 at 9:25PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...
Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice
Calcasieu River near White Oak Park
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas...
Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage
Atchafalaya River At Morgan City
Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier
Calcasieu River Near Glenmora
Sabine River Near Deweyville
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Calcasieu River near Glenmora.
* WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Some roads upstream from Glenmora, including Strothers Crossing Road near the community of Calcasieu and Price Crossing Road near Hineston have two to three feet of water over the road and are subject to being closed. Flooding of forested areas near the river will also occur.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to 13.5 feet Sunday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
